name: FUR Squadron
overview: An arcade space shooter which follows the adventure of a team of elite pilots during what seems at first a routine training in virtual reality. In this mind-blowing journey through retrowave aesthetic environments and synthwave music you will shoot your way through the simulations (or not?) of the units and minions of the evil Skal Empire. + An action and narrative-driven on-rails adventure with a classic 90’s shooter flair. + Smooth and quick gameplay through levels full of enemies and massive bosses. Unlock their secrets and power-up your star ship for maximum performance. + Six Levels. Three levels of difficulty piloting a variety of ships. + Original synthesizer soundtrack to match the retrowave aesthetics. + A lovely axolotl!
